p.d: Rita does everything possible to keep her first customers, Pierre and Josiane, a couple from Quebec, as Zoël and Terri finish off the holiday cottage. Gilberte joins in the effort and Edmour becomes friends with Pierre who appreciates his return to the farm. An unexpected surprise gives Rita new hope... Directed by: Jean-Marc Piché (season 1, Canada, 2017) Screenplay: Patricia Léger Cast: Patricia Léger (Rita Melanson), Marie-Jo Thério (Yolande LeBlanc), Marcel-Romain Thériault (Lomer Dupuis), Marc Lamontagne (Edmour LeBlanc), Raphaël Butler (Ferraille Gaudet), Claire Normand (Gilberte Cormier), Gabriel Robichaud (Zoël Bourgeois), Bianca Richard (Terri Cormier) Genre: comedy
